original_title: Não Quero Ir Nada Mais Que Até o Fundo
overview: Samanta works for a third-party messaging service company, while dealing in therapy with the grief over her mother’s death. Santiago misses his girlfriend and attends a support group. In the same city, a peculiar waiter works while reciting poetry in his bar.
title: Não Quero Ir Nada Mais Que Até o Fundo
